email.subject: Complaint
email.body:
Hello,

I hope this email finds you well.

I am reaching out to inquire about your services. Could you please provide more details?

Best regards,
Your Name

complaint.title: Complaint Submission
complaint.description: If you get any complaints or feedbacks toward us, let us know through this form
complaint.disclaimer: According to peraturan OJK NOMOR 18/POJK.07/2018 MTF, WFI Indonesia has the rights to reject handling complaints if Customer and/or Customer Representative does not  complete the complaint document requirements. For Complaint Document can be sent through email: cs@woorifinance.co.id

modal.title: Your Request was Successfully Submitted!

Our team will contact you shortly.
You will soon receive a message through your submitted email.

hero.title: The Right Solution for Your Showroom Needs
hero.description: Get easy access to funds to support inventory growth, showroom expansion, and increase your profitability.

stockFinancing.title: Grow Your Business with Stock Financing
stockFinancing.content:
Our Stock Financing application process is designed to be as simple as possible, so you can focus on more important things like developing your Showroom business.
With easy-to-meet requirements and a fast approval process, you can quickly get the funds you need.

items.detail: Passenger cars (not ex-taxi) that have an invoice from the Sole Agent Brand Holder (ATPM)

persyaratan.title: Document Requirements
persyaratan.subtitle: Required documents for Stock Financing application

items.title: ID Card (KTP)
items.description: National Identity Card (KTP) of the management as stated in the latest company deed

items.title: Bank Statement
items.description: Savings book or bank statement for the last 3 months

items.title: Tax ID Number (NPWP)
items.description: As proof of customer's financial and tax responsibility

items.title: Office Building Lease Proof
items.description: If the office building is still occupied

hero.title: Invest in Equipment, Grow Your Business
hero.description: Our Heavy Equipment Financing allows you to invest in high-quality equipment and machinery to maintain operational efficiency and support your business growth.

products.title: Heavy Equipment Financing Products We Provide

new.title: New Heavy Equipment Financing
new.content: The ideal solution to support your new heavy equipment needs! With flexible financing and competitive interest rates, we help you acquire the latest heavy equipment to boost your productivity and business efficiency. Own the best heavy equipment without delaying your expansion plans.

used.title: Used Heavy Equipment Financing
used.content: Get quality used heavy equipment that suits your business needs, through easy and flexible financing schemes. We understand your business need for cost efficiency without sacrificing performance. With our used heavy equipment financing, you can optimize working capital while ensuring smooth operations.

step1.title: Customer Meets CMO
step1.description: Meet the CMO to submit the required documents

step2.title: Customer Project Survey by CMO
step2.description: Projects requiring Heavy Equipment Financing will undergo a quality inspection by the CMO

step3.title: Credit Application Approval Process
step3.description: After credit approval, a credit offer letter will be sent to the customer

step4.title: Signing the Credit Offer Letter
step4.description: Sign the credit agreement before the first payment to WFI

step5.title: Delivery and Payment
step5.description: Heavy Equipment Delivery, Verification, through to Payment and Contract Delivery

items.title: ID Card (KTP)
items.description: National Identity Card (KTP) of the management as stated in the latest company deed

items.title: Bank Statement
items.description: Savings book or bank statement for the last 3 months

items.title: Tax ID Number (NPWP)
items.description: As proof of customer's financial and tax responsibility

cabangPenyedia.title: Heavy Equipment Financing Service Provider Branch

riplay.title: RIPLAY
riplay.description: Download the Product and Service Information Summary (RIPLAY) as information for all Woori Finance debtors

hero.title: A Glimpse of Our Car Financing
hero.description: Our vehicle financing options offer competitive interest rates, a fast process, and easy requirements. Whether buying a new or used car, get pre-approval today and drive with confidence!

used.title: Used Car
used.content: Our Used Car Financing offers an easy and fast way to purchase a used vehicle. Buying a used car is easier and faster with simple requirements and competitive interest rates. You can apply for financing with payment options tailored to your budget.

tenure.label: Financing Tenure
tenure.value: Financing tenure options ranging from 12 to 60 months

interest.label: Competitive Interest Rate
interest.value: Enjoy interest rates that make your monthly payments more affordable.

new.title: New Car
new.content: Simplify your decision to bring home a new car with our Car Financing service. Buying a new car is easier and faster with simple requirements and competitive interest rates.

tenure.label: Financing Tenure
tenure.value: Financing tenure options ranging from 12 to 60 months

interest.label: Competitive Interest Rate
interest.value: Enjoy interest rates that make your monthly payments more affordable.

step1.title: Prospective Customer Selects a Car
step1.description: The prospective customer visits the showroom and selects their desired car first.

step2.title: Simulation Calculation and Data Verification
step2.description: The CMO will provide the customer with a credit simulation calculation. If the customer agrees, a data verification process will be conducted.

step3.title: CMO Conducts Document Completeness Check
step3.description: The CMO will conduct a survey to collect and verify the completeness of the required documents.

step4.title: Customer Financing Application Approval
step4.description: If the customer qualifies for Financing, the customer's complete data will be submitted to the branch or head office for the approval stage.

step5.title: Delivery and Payment
step5.description: After approval and payment, the car will be delivered to the customer.
